Texts.Eng: AA Batteries, Batteries, and S-Power Cells in your inventory are instantly used when Energy falls below 25% Max Energy. Items are used from weakest to strongest, and instantly grant Energy. AA Batteries give +20 Energy, Batteries give +60 Energy, and S-Power Cells restore 50% of Max Energy. There is a 10 second cooldown between each activation!
The Engineer Station allows you craft electronics using fewer materials!
While Hunger is near satiated, you and nearby Players and NPCs gain increased Max Energy.
